groups.name: ~anime
groups.summary: Posts about anime and the related media/genres including TV shows, manga, movies, and games.

groups.name: ~arts
groups.summary: Articles and discussions about the arts - theatre, drawing, painting, photography, poetry, etc.

groups.name: ~books
groups.summary: Discussion, news and articles related to books (fiction or non-fiction).

groups.name: ~comp
groups.summary: Topics focused on the more technical side of computers, things of interest to programmers, sysadmins, etc.

groups.name: ~creative
groups.summary: Arts, crafts, and other DIY-ish things.

groups.name: ~design
groups.summary: Topics related to design, both physical (e.g. fashion, architecture, products) and non-physical (e.g. logos, web design, advertising)

groups.name: ~enviro
groups.summary: Topics related to the environment - conservation, recycling, alternate energy, etc.

groups.name: ~games.game_design
groups.summary: Articles and discussion about game design including mechanics, environments, audio, and AI.

groups.name: ~games.tabletop
groups.summary: Topics about tabletop games: board games (both modern and classical), role-playing games, card games, etc.
